content.text: Match ends, Las Palmas 2, Mallorca 2.
Second Half ends, Las Palmas 2, Mallorca 2.
Attempt saved. Masoud Shojaei (Las Palmas) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Nauzet Alemán.
Rubén Miño (Mallorca) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Deivid (Las Palmas).

Javi Castellano (Las Palmas) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Las Palmas. Javi Castellano replaces Vicente Gómez.
Substitution, Las Palmas. Asdrúbal replaces Apoño.

Substitution, Mallorca. Tomer Hemed replaces Alexandre Geijo.
